add_subscription.q: How do I add a new subscription?
add_subscription.a: Tap the ‚Äú+‚Äù button on the dashboard, select a service or create a custom one, enter the price and renewal date, then save.

edit_subscription.q: How can I edit or update a subscription?
edit_subscription.a: Open the subscription from the dashboard and tap ‚ÄúEdit‚Äù. You can change the price, billing interval, category, or renewal date.

renewal_reminders.q: How do I set up renewal reminders?
renewal_reminders.a: Renewal reminders are automatic. Trakio tracks renewal dates and shows upcoming payments in advance.

currencies.a: Yes. Each subscription can have its own currency. You can also set a base currency in settings.

backup_data.q: How do I back up my data?
backup_data.a: Go to Settings ‚Üí Data Management to export your subscriptions and payment history as CSV or JSON.

premium_features.q: What features are included in Premium?
premium_features.a: Premium includes analytics, budget management, payment history export, notifications, and advanced insights.

delete_subscription.q: How do I delete a subscription?
delete_subscription.a: Swipe a subscription to the left or open it and tap ‚ÄúDelete‚Äù.

custom_categories.a: Yes. Custom categories are available with Premium.

premium.expires_notice: Premium expires on {{date}}. You can resubscribe at any time.
premium.expired_notice: Premium has expired. Upgrade to regain access.

payment.failed_notice: Payment failed. Please update your payment info to keep Premium access.

projection.description: Estimated expenses based on your recent subscription payments.

widerruf.title: Right of Withdrawal
widerruf.right.title: Right of Withdrawal
widerruf.right.text1: Consumers have the right to withdraw from this contract within fourteen days without giving any reason.
widerruf.right.text2: The withdrawal period is fourteen days from the day the contract is concluded.
widerruf.exercise.title: Exercising the Right of Withdrawal
widerruf.exercise.text: To exercise your right of withdrawal, you must inform us (Trakio, Kassel, Germany, Email: support@trakio.de) of your decision by means of a clear statement (e.g. by email).
widerruf.exclusion.title: Exclusion of the Right of Withdrawal for Digital Content
widerruf.exclusion.text: The right of withdrawal expires early if we have started to execute the contract after you have expressly agreed that we may begin execution before the withdrawal period has expired, and you have confirmed your knowledge that you lose your right of withdrawal by agreeing.
withdrawal.title: Right of Withdrawal
withdrawal.description: Information about your 14-day statutory right to withdraw from this contract
impressum.title: Legal Notice
impressum.subtitle: Provider Identification
impressum.provider.title: Provider
impressum.address.name: FULL LEGAL NAME (e.g. Firstname Lastname)
impressum.contact.title: Contact
impressum.vat.title: VAT Information
impressum.vat.text: No VAT identification number according to ¬ß27a of the German Value Added Tax Act (UStG) due to the small business regulation (Kleinunternehmerregelung).
impressum.disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
impressum.disclaimer.text: We are responsible for the content of our own pages in accordance with general laws. We do not assume responsibility for the content of external links. Responsibility for the content of linked pages lies solely with their respective operators.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Information about the processing of personal data
privacy.1.title: 1. Controller
privacy.1.name: FULL LEGAL NAME (e.g. Firstname Lastname)
privacy.2.title: 2. Categories of Data Processed
privacy.2.p1: When using Trakio, we process the following categories of personal data:
privacy.2.li1: Account data (e.g. email address, authentication tokens).
privacy.2.li2: Application data (e.g. subscriptions, categories, prices, payment history, preferences).
privacy.2.li3: Technical and log data (e.g. IP address, device and browser information, access times) necessary for security and operation.
privacy.3.title: 3. Purposes and Legal Bases
privacy.3.p1: Personal data is processed for the following purposes:
privacy.3.li1: Provision and operation of the application and user accounts.
privacy.3.li2: Storage, synchronization, and analysis of subscription data.
privacy.3.li3: Processing payments and managing premium subscriptions via Stripe.
privacy.3.li4: Ensuring IT security, preventing abuse, and resolving technical issues.
privacy.3.legal: Processing is based on Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (performance of a contract), Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest, in particular security and stability), and Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR (consent), where applicable.
privacy.4.title: 4. Recipients and Processors
privacy.4.p1: We use carefully selected service providers (processors) to operate Trakio:
privacy.4.li1: Hosting and infrastructure: Vercel (application hosting, logs).
privacy.4.li2: Database and storage: Upstash (subscription and application data).
privacy.4.li3: Payment processing: Stripe (subscription management, billing, invoices).
privacy.4.note: Data processing agreements (Art. 28 GDPR) are in place. For more information, see the privacy policies of:
privacy.5.title: 5. Data Retention
privacy.5.p1: Personal data is stored only for as long as necessary to fulfill the stated purposes or as required by law. Users may delete their account and application data at any time. Statutory retention obligations, particularly for billing and payment data, remain unaffected.
privacy.6.title: 6. Your Rights
privacy.6.p1: You have the right to access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, and objection in accordance with Arts. 15‚Äì21 GDPR.
privacy.6.p2: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. In Hessen, this is the Hessian Commissioner for Data Protection and Freedom of Information (HBDI).
privacy.7.title: 7. Contact
privacy.7.p1: If you have any questions regarding the processing of your personal data, please contact us at
agb.title: Terms & Conditions (AGB)
agb.1.title: 1. Scope
agb.1.p1: These Terms and Conditions govern the use of the web-based software "Trakio" for managing subscriptions and recurring expenses.
agb.1.p2: The provider is the service provider named in the Legal Notice (Impressum). These terms apply exclusively to consumers within the meaning of ¬ß 13 of the German Civil Code (BGB).
agb.2.title: 2. Subject Matter
agb.2.p1: Trakio provides a digital application that enables users to record, manage, and analyze subscriptions and recurring expenses.
agb.2.p2: The provider does not owe any specific financial success or savings, but solely the provision of the software in its current technical form.
agb.3.title: 3. Registration and User Account
agb.3.p1: Use of Trakio requires registration with a valid email address. Users are responsible for keeping their access credentials confidential.
agb.3.p2: The provider may suspend or terminate user accounts in the event of misuse, violations of these terms, or legal requirements.
agb.4.title: 4. Availability and Technical Limitations
agb.4.p1: The provider strives to ensure high availability of the service but does not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation.
agb.4.p2: Temporary restrictions may occur due to maintenance, security updates, or technical issues.
agb.5.title: 5. Free Version and Premium Subscription
agb.5.p1: Trakio is available in a free basic version. Certain advanced features require a paid premium subscription.
agb.5.p2: Payment processing and subscription management are handled via the payment service provider Stripe.
agb.6.title: 6. Trial Period
agb.6.p1: The provider may offer a free trial period. If a paid subscription is selected, billing will begin automatically after the trial period ends, unless the subscription is cancelled before the end of the trial.
agb.7.title: 7. Payment, Term, and Cancellation
agb.7.p1: Premium subscriptions are billed monthly or yearly in advance. Prices are displayed before completing the order.
agb.7.p2: Users may cancel their subscription at any time via the online account or customer portal. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period.
agb.8.title: 8. Right of Withdrawal
agb.8.p1: Consumers have a statutory right of withdrawal. This right expires prematurely for digital content if the user expressly agrees that the provider begins performance before the withdrawal period expires and confirms knowledge of the loss of the right of withdrawal.
agb.9.title: 9. User Obligations
agb.9.p1: Users must use Trakio in accordance with applicable laws. Any misuse, manipulation, or interference with the service is prohibited.
agb.10.title: 10. Liability
agb.10.p1: The provider is liable without limitation for intent and gross negligence.
agb.10.p2: In cases of slight negligence, liability exists only for the breach of essential contractual obligations (cardinal obligations) and is limited to foreseeable, typical damages.
agb.10.p3: Liability for data loss is limited to the damage that would have occurred even if proper and regular data backups had been performed by the user.
agb.11.title: 11. Data Protection
agb.11.p1: Personal data is processed in accordance with applicable data protection laws, in particular the GDPR. Further information can be found in the Privacy Policy.
agb.12.title: 12. Changes to the Terms
agb.12.p1: The provider may amend these Terms for valid reasons, such as legal changes or functional extensions. Users will be informed of material changes in an appropriate manner.
agb.13.title: 13. Final Provisions
agb.13.p1: The law of the Federal Republic of Germany applies. Should individual provisions be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions remain unaffected.

Any active subscriptions will be cancelled and cannot be restored.
